title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop, your all-in-one solution for effortless cleaning! This sleek, black, and powerful machine is designed to tackle both wet and dry messes on a variety of surfaces, including hard floors and area rugs.

Experience the convenience of cordless cleaning with the CrossWave's 36V Lithium-Ion battery, providing up to 30 minutes of uninterrupted cleaning time. The rotating brush system offers a 10.5-inch cleaning path width, ensuring a thorough clean every time. Its swivel head and carry handle make it easy to maneuver around furniture and tight spaces.

With a 28 oz clean water tank and 18.6 oz dirt tank, you can clean more area without frequent emptying. The CrossWave is compatible with a range of surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs.

The CrossWave takes the hassle out of edge cleaning with its improved edge cleaning feature, ensuring no spot is left untouched. Its self-cleaning cycle makes maintenance a breeze, and with WiFi connectivity, you can control and monitor your cleaning with the BISSELL Connect app.

As part of your purchase, you'll receive 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls. Plus, every purchase supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation, helping pets in need.

Upgrade your cleaning routine with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. Order yours today!
